data.title: Doctor Of Philosophy
data.meta_description: assAs - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document is a prospectus for the Doctor of Philosophy (PhD) program from Krishna Kanta Handiqui State Open University. It provides information about the university leadership and officials, background on the founder KK Handiqui, and a message from the Vice Chancellor emphasizing that the university was established to provide higher education opportunities through open and distance learning. It aims to build human resources and foster economic growth through generating employment. The university currently offers bachelor's, master's and diploma programs and is introducing PhD programs in various disciplines to conduct research in open and distance learning and identify gaps to design new courses.
